title: Urban Property Marketplace
description: An online marketplace for businesses, entrepreneurs, and individuals to find and list commercial properties across various categories.
purpose: To provide a user-friendly platform for buying, selling, and renting commercial properties like offices, warehouses, entertainment venues, restaurants, and retail spaces. The platform also enables property owners to list and promote their properties easily.

features.title: Easy Property Search
features.description: Search properties easily with filters for location, type, budget, etc.

features.title: Detailed Property Listings
features.description: Listings include images, descriptions, and contact information.

features.title: Booking System
features.description: Book co-working spaces, meeting rooms, and event venues.

features.title: Review System
features.description: Review properties and services to make informed decisions.

features.title: Agent and Landlord Profiles
features.description: Connect directly with agents and landlords.

features.title: Regular Updates
features.description: Stay updated with events, offers, and new properties.
